This document is a registration issued to the named
registrant for the vehicle and time period indicated above by the New York

State Department of Motor Vehicles pending the issuance of permanent
registration credentials and/or license plates and is intended for use on that
vehicle as if such credentials and plates had been issued and were affixed to
the vehicle. This document may be a photocopy and must be carried in the
vehicle at all times. Void if altered or erased. NYS VALIDATION STAMP
VOID UNLESS VALIDATED

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
